allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Epoch Holdings website

Static HTML website configured for Vercel deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Vercel output directory configuration

Set outputDirectory to root and disable build command for static site.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Link Epoch Markets button to epochmarkets.co

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Replace headline with logo featuring liquid glass effect

- Added EH monogram logo as centerpiece
- Applied translucent liquid glass styling with glow
- Logo inverted for dark background visibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Link Markets nav item to epochmarkets.co

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
